attributes.action: Stop taxing bonuses we receive from work!
attributes.additional_details: Taxing the little extra we make once a year for the hard work we put it that you have had no contribution to makes zero sense. If we are working the whole year in hope that the company performs well and gives us a bonus and you tax us on that it’s absolutely ridiculous and especially the rate at which it’s taxed!
attributes.background: You already tax our salary which you don’t work for and don’t use the tax money for it’s intended use.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/629292
